input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle

Product keywords:
Unique, holiday themed die-casts of favorite cars characters!
Each has festive, seasonal details and colors and comes with a unique Easter basket!
Choice of four vehicles: the Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen or Easter Ramone. Each sold separately, subject to availability
Perfect for collecting and as a gift for your favorite cars fan's basket!
Collect them all!

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Wow! These die-cast Cars characters are so unique and fun for the holiday! This Lightning McQueen has festive, seasonal details and colors and comes with a unique Easter basket! They are so collectible and would make a great gift for your favorite Cars fan. Collect them all before they are gone!
input_text.Response B:
Attention: Introducing the Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle, a limited edition, holiday-themed collectible that embodies the spirit of springtime fun and adventure!

Interest: This unique die-cast features Lightning McQueen, the beloved racecar with a festive Easter twist. Adorned with seasonal details and colors, this vehicle is sure to delight any Cars fan, especially when paired with its matching Easter basket. Choose from four different vehicles, each one a treasure to behold and collect!

Desire: Imagine the thrill of adding this Easter Lightning McQueen to your collection or gifting it to your little speedster's Easter basket. The attention to detail and craftsmanship make this die-cast a standout piece, perfect for showcasing your love for all things Cars.

Action: Don't miss out on this opportunity to bring home the Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle today! With four unique vehicles to choose from, you can collect them all and create a holiday tradition that will delight your loved ones for years to come.

Product Specifications:

* Unique, holiday-themed die-casts of favorite Cars characters
* Each comes with a festive Easter basket and seasonal details
* Choice of four vehicles: Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen, or Easter Ramone
* Perfect for collecting and as a gift for your favorite Cars fan's Easter basket
* Collect them all!

Tech Specs:

* Made of high-quality die-cast metal
* Painted with vibrant, holiday-themed colors
* Intricate details and textures bring the characters to life
* Each vehicle measures approximately 1:55 scale
* Packaged in a festive Easter basket with a unique design
* Suitable for ages 3+

Don't miss out on this limited edition, holiday-themed collectible! Get your Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle today and make this Easter one to remember!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
